Macros

#define IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_VIDEO_NF   (BSP_VID_DEC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1000U)
 Set TVP5158 video noise filter parameters. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_AUDIO_MODE   (BSP_VID_DEC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1001U)
 Set TVP5158 video noise filter parameters. More...
 

Detailed Description

In addition to the IOCTLs listed above the following common IOCTLs are applicable to this driver.

  • External Video Decoder IOCTL's

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_AUDIO_MODE   (BSP_VID_DEC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1001U)

Set TVP5158 video noise filter parameters.

This IOCTL can be called separetly for each channel.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_VIDEO_NF   (BSP_VID_DEC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1000U)

Set TVP5158 video noise filter parameters.

This IOCTL can be called separetly for each channel.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_Tvp5158VideoNfParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
